name: Confetti Genie
description:
Generate random confetti pattern on your canvas.

It works with frame layers.


Shapes included

  • Rectangles
  • Circles
  • Triangles
  • Polygons
  • Stars


More fun

  • Creates the density of confetti based upon useâ€™s selection
  • Varying opacity for depth
  • Random positioning inside the frame
